post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, July 25
post.Content:
A quick post today as I battle without internet and an overflowing todo list. Enjoy! :-)

  • Thomas Nield has written about CompositeObservables, a feature in RxJavaFX.
  • Edvin Syse has posted a screencast on TornadoFX SwitchView/ViewModel/Validation.
  • Speaking of Edvin, he has also released TornadoFX 1.5.2.
  • Thomas KÃ¼nneth has posted about an upcoming workshop he is working on for Java on mobile devices.
